oshi.util.platform.mac

Class SmcUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • oshi.util.platform.mac.SmcUtil

  • public class SmcUtil
extends Object
    Provides access to SMC calls on OS X
    Author:
    widdis[at]gmail[dot]com

    • Method Summary

      static double smcGetSp78(String key, int retries)
      Get a value from SMC which is in SP78 datatype (used for Temperature) First bit is sign, next 7 bits are integer portion, last 8 bits are fractional portion

    • Method Detail

      • smcOpen

        public static int smcOpen()
        Open a connection to SMC
        Returns:
        0 if successful, nonzero if failure

      • smcClose

        public static int smcClose()
        Close connection to SMC
        Returns:
        0 if successful, nonzero if failure

      • smcGetSp78

        public static double smcGetSp78(String key,
                                int retries)
        Get a value from SMC which is in SP78 datatype (used for Temperature) First bit is sign, next 7 bits are integer portion, last 8 bits are fractional portion
        Parameters:
        key - The key to retrieve
        retries - Number of times to retry the key
        Returns:
        Double representing the value

      • smcGetLong

        public static long smcGetLong(String key,
                              int retries)
        Get a 64-bit integer value from SMC
        Parameters:
        key - The key to retrieve
        retries - Number of times to retry the key
        Returns:
        Long representing the value

      • smcGetFpe2

        public static float smcGetFpe2(String key,
                               int retries)
        Get a value from SMC which is in FPE2 datatype. First E (14) bits are unsigned integer portion, Last 2 bits are fractional portion
        Parameters:
        key - The key to retrieve
        retries - Number of times to retry the key
        Returns:
        Float representing the value

      • smcGetKeyInfo

        public static int smcGetKeyInfo(IOKit.SMCKeyData inputStructure,
                                IOKit.SMCKeyData outputStructure)
        Get cached keyInfo if it exists, or generate new keyInfo
        Parameters:
        inputStructure - Key data input
        outputStructure - Key data output
        Returns:
        0 if successful, nonzero if failure

      • smcReadKey

        public static int smcReadKey(String key,
                             IOKit.SMCVal val,
                             int retries)
        Read a key from SMC
        Parameters:
        key - Key to read
        val - Structure to receive the result
        retries - Number of attempts to try
        Returns:
        0 if successful, nonzero if failure

      • smcCall

        public static int smcCall(int index,
                          IOKit.SMCKeyData inputStructure,
                          IOKit.SMCKeyData outputStructure)
        Call SMC
        Parameters:
        index - Kernel index
        inputStructure - Key data input
        outputStructure - Key data output
        Returns:
        0 if successful, nonzero if failure
